title: Voltage rating
fullText:
The principles of connection to the installation including the minimum voltage rating of the switch(es) and the neutral-earth connection shall be in accordance with AS/NZS 3010.
Where a switching device is used, it shall have a minimum voltage rating not less than the maximum out-of-phase voltage between the sources.
Exception: Where a manual source selection switch has an intermediate "off" position between each pair of positions that select sources, the switch need only be rated for the nominal voltage.
